itunes:title: Episode 072: Sophie, Phoebe, Irma, Celeste, & Esme (feat. Charles Pulliam-Moore)
title: Episode 072: Sophie, Phoebe, Irma, Celeste, & Esme (feat. Charles Pulliam-Moore)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 72 of CEREBRO, Connor and writer Charles Pulliam-Moore merge their minds with Sophie, Phoebe, Irma, Celeste, and Esme: the startling Stepford Cuckoos! Created by Grant Morrison, the crème de la crème of Emma Frost's telepathy class is a psychic gestalt of five identical girls with a terrible secret.

The CEREBRO character file on the Five-In-One begins at 1:40:12.

(Content Advisory: The Cuckoos' story includes brainwashing, violation of reproductive autonomy, grooming by a teacher, substance abuse, genocide, and suicide. Reference is made to child sex abuse of another character.)



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
